column4: Latest;Pailin: The body of a missing woman who ------drowned in a border stream------ has been found after almost a week .------The body of the woman who crossed the border from illegally from Thailand with her family
column5: and was swept away in a river after a storm was found at 12:10 pm on September 26
column8: about 5 kilometers from the scene.------According to the police
column9: the body of the victim was found after searching for several days and was found in an orange plantation in Ochheukrom village
column12: Pailin province.------After a forensic examination the body was handed over the body to the family for a traditional ceremony. KPSBN
